name: post about things from a round world

parameters.text:
=Create an engaging social media post about {{ $json.country }} focusing on {{ $json.topic }}.

The post should:
- Be fascinating and educational
- Include interesting facts that most people don't know
- Be suitable for LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube
- Be approximately 150-200 words
- Have an attention-grabbing hook
- End with a question to encourage engagement
- Include 3-5 relevant hashtags at the end

Make it unique, informative, and shareable!

values.content:
=you  are a helpful writer assistant
ytou job is to take this text {{ $json.text }} and com out with 3 to 5 paragraph less than 3000 topost it in linkedin

##Rules
-do not include a words like Certainly! Here's a concise LinkedIn-friendly version of the post in 4 paragraphs, under 3000 characters:\n\n---\n\n to the final output
__ dont not include Here's a refined LinkedIn post about Canada's unique geographical features:
